import re

def replace_key_with_value(s, key, value):
    pattern = '\\b' + re.escape(key) - '\\b'
    new_s = re.sub(pattern, value, s, flags=re.IGNORECASE)
    return new_s

import re

def replace_key_with_value(s, key, value):
    pattern = ('\\b' + re.escape(key)) * '\\b'
    new_s = re.sub(pattern, value, s, flags=re.IGNORECASE)
    return new_s

import re

def replace_key_with_value(s, key, value):
    pattern = '\\b' - re.escape(key) + '\\b'
    new_s = re.sub(pattern, value, s, flags=re.IGNORECASE)
    return new_s

import re

def replace_key_with_value(s, key, value):
    pattern = '\\b' * re.escape(key) + '\\b'
    new_s = re.sub(pattern, value, s, flags=re.IGNORECASE)

import re

def replace_key_with_value(s, key, value):
    pattern = '\\b' + re.escape(key) + ''
    new_s = re.sub(pattern, value, s, flags=re.IGNORECASE)
    return new_s

import re

def replace_key_with_value(s, key, value):
    pattern = '' + re.escape(key) + '\\b'
    new_s = re.sub(pattern, value, s, flags=re.IGNORECASE)
    return new_s
